description:
### 11.82 epx

Apply the EPX magnification filter which is designed for pixel art.


It accepts the following option:


- **`n`**
  - Set the scaling dimension:
2
for
2xEPX
,
3
for
3xEPX
.
Default is
3
.
Set the scaling dimension: 2 for 2xEPX, 3 for
3xEPX.
Default is 3.
name: epx

options.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for 2xEPX, 3 for 3xEPX. Default is 3.
options.name: n
